sect1.title: Postfilters
sect1.para: Template postfilters are PHP functions that your templates are ran through after they are compiled. Postfilters can be either registered or loaded from the plugins directory by using load_filter() function or by setting $autoload_filters variable. Smarty will pass the compiled template code as the first argument, and expect the function to return the result of the processing.
